page.title: 06OLD FARM
page.content: The owners name is Mr.Gunnell,and he has two sons,both in their twenties and one tractor driver. They have 50 bullocks,and 1 cow for milking. They used to have 2000 litres of milk a day -two tanks full.One cow would give ten gallons a day, if it felt good. 100 cows were milked. The oldest cow is 13 years old. The farmers put oats in little lofts above the feeding troughs for animals. Rats bother Mr.Gunnell,but he has to get rid of them. They used to buy 2000 bails of hay, but now only 1000. They have 7 tractors of several different makes. The 525 Massey Fergusson,is the Combine Harvester.The knives cut the corn. Altogether,they own 300 acres. They get up at 6.00,and milk cows at 6.30 in the morning and night.
